description: Updates the traffic distribution for a given traffic distribution group. For more information about updating a traffic distribution group, see Update telephony traffic distribution across Amazon Web Services Regions in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The identifier of the traffic distribution group. This can be the ID or the ARN if the API is being called in the Region where the traffic distribution group was created. The ARN must be provided if the call is from the replicated Region.

parameters.name: TelephonyConfig
parameters.description: The distribution of traffic between the instance and its replica(s). Information about traffic distributions. (dict) --- Information about a traffic distribution. The Amazon Web Services Region where the traffic is distributed. The percentage of the traffic that is distributed, in increments of 10.

nested_params.name: Region
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where the traffic is distributed.

nested_params.name: Percentage
nested_params.description: The percentage of the traffic that is distributed, in increments of 10.

parameters.name: SignInConfig
parameters.description: The distribution that determines which Amazon Web Services Regions should be used to sign in agents in to both the instance and its replica(s). Information about traffic distributions. (dict) --- The distribution of sign in traffic between the instance and its replica(s). The Amazon Web Services Region of the sign in distribution. Whether sign in distribution is enabled.

nested_params.name: Region
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Region of the sign in distribution.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: Whether sign in distribution is enabled.

parameters.name: AgentConfig
parameters.description: The distribution of agents between the instance and its replica(s). Information about traffic distributions. (dict) --- Information about a traffic distribution. The Amazon Web Services Region where the traffic is distributed. The percentage of the traffic that is distributed, in increments of 10.

nested_params.name: Region
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where the traffic is distributed.

nested_params.name: Percentage
nested_params.description: The percentage of the traffic that is distributed, in increments of 10.
